[mk_page_section bg_image=”https://www.mrjanitorialsupplies.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/janitorial-supplies.jpg” bg_position=”center bottom” bg_stretch=”true” video_color_mask=”#000000″ video_opacity=”0.4″ padding_top=”100″ padding_bottom=”100″ el_class=”home-page-bg” sidebar=”sidebar-1″][vc_column][vc_row_inner visibility=”hidden-sm” css=”.vc_custom_1449623819654{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”200px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h1″ color=”#ffffff” size=”50″ font_weight=”bold” font_family=”none” align=”center”]Providing service beyond distribution.[/mk_fancy_title][mk_divider style=”thin_solid” divider_width=”custom_width” custom_width=”100″ thickness=”3″ margin_top=”10″ margin_bottom=”30″][mk_fancy_title color=”#ffffff” size=”26″ font_weight=”300″ font_family=”none” align=”center”]ISO-9001 & ISO 14001 Registered[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section padding_top=”50″ padding_bottom=”20″ sidebar=”sidebar-1″][vc_column][vc_column_text align=”center”]Mr. Janitorial Supplies is an ISO-9001 as well as an ISO-14001 registered company. Distributors of: Paper products, cleaning chemicals, garbage bags, health and safety products, matting, personal care products, packaging and shipping supplies.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][mk_fancy_title color=”#107f4f” size=”32″ font_weight=”bold” margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none” align=”center”]Why Us?[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text align=”center”]

We listen:
Some people that don’t know us wonder why we ask so many questions…it’s because we need to hear your concerns so our team can recommend solutions that fits your needs.

Innovative:
Whether it’s our online ordering portal or our GPS enabled trucks, we strive to innovate.  That includes partnering with best in class manufacturers to deliver value every day.

Family Owned:
There are no multi layers of management and passing of the buck. When it comes to caring no one does it better than family.

Affordable solutions:
With a 31 year history of continuous growth we bulk purchase directly from almost every major manufacturer in our marketplace. No middlemen involved. That means we can be competitive with the big box retailers.

Flexibility:
Need delivery every Monday morning? Need us to stock a specific item just for you?  Want us to bundle non-core items on the same delivery? We don’t have the cookie cutter mentality. Work with us and we will work with you to find the solution that works.
